home.title: The first step towards greater security
home.description: SafePass allows you to perform multiple actions to improve your digital security such as generating random passwords, checking the security of your passwords and checking if they have been leaked.

home-images.checker: Check if you have compromised passwords
home-images.validator: Check the security of your passwords

checker-component.title: Checking leaked passwords
checker-component.not-leaked: The password has not been leaked! Congratulations!

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subject: Your subject
contact.subjectPlaceholder: Let us know how we can help you

guide.Strong-passwords-description: Combine uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters to make them unbreakable.
guide.Diversify-your-passwords-description: Do not use the same password everywhere. A password manager is your ally.
guide.Make-them-long-and-powerful-description: Opt for passwords of at least 16 characters. Length adds strength.
guide.Update-constantly-description: Change your passwords regularly, at least every 3-6 months. Keep them fresh!
guide.Two-factor-authentication-description: Enable two-factor authentication whenever possible. Double security!
guide.Secure-connections-always-description: Use secure connections (HTTPS) when changing or entering passwords. Avoid unsafe public networks.
guide.Awareness-and-training-description: Educate users about the importance of secure passwords. Stay informed about threats.
guide.Monitor-your-accounts-description: Regularly review your account activity. Detect and act against suspicious activities!
